column5: Contact the Ministry of Natural Resources, the plastic cards were supposed to have been issued by 12/31/2009. 1-800-387-7011 is their toll free number.
Our cards went directly from the mail to the box holding our passports so we do not forget them.

OK.............. a really really stupid question.........what purpose does "the card" serve???? I got one in the mail last fall from ontario........have no clue what it's used for...........thanks.......

If I'm not mistaken it was generated so you wouldn't have to give anymore personal information when applying for a license and you would be able to renew your license online with just the card number. I still don't see where non residents can renew online yet
I still don't see where non residents can renew online yet " You cant yet...only residents can...I called the MNR and they said non residents wont be able to apply online until 2011..
In 2009 they said it would be available 2010 Doesn't matter I'm not going to hold me breath
My Ontario Outdoors Card got put into my billfold this morning. I'll use it at Bobby's Corner around 3 p.m. May 13, 2010 to buy my license.
Connie you got me by two weeks,

How long did it take for you to get your card? I haven't applied yet...we are going up the last week in May...wondering if I should try to get it online now, or just wait and do it all at once when we get up there?
May as well get it when you buy your new license. My post was to remind fishermen to take their card with them next time they head to Canada. Wouldn't do much good sitting on my desk at home.
Mine was put in my wallet the day I got it, just hope I get to use it at some point this season. Good reminder though
Whopper, I can pick up a hitchhiker (in Indianapolis) at 10:30 a.m. (Red Lake time) on May 12. Pack your sleeping bag.
That sounds like an offer you can't refuse.Wow that's early Connie, hope the ice is out.
Whopper's been with me on this one the past three years.
LOL Solo We watched ice out two years ago, it was awesome
Paid fee in Minaki last week of August, still no card
